title: Sound On: US Exits Afghan War, Google Suit (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: US Exits Afghan War, Google Suit (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.

Guests: Republican Ohio Congressman Warren Davidson, Bloomberg Politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Bloomberg opinion columnist Eli Lake, and North Carolina Attorney General Josh Stein.

To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
